item.title: Smash Corner: King Dedede - Surely you jestin’?
item.author: Mahdi Rahim,
item.description: Do you want to play Smash with sass and style? Perhaps you’re a swordfighter, looking for a change up in weaponry, maybe something with a bit more brute force, maybe a mallet? Do you wish to infuriate your opponent by living to the most obscene of percentages, coming back each time to serve a …
